measured_by: single item asking respondents to choose among six PAPM stage options
justification: “participants were asked ‘Which of the following best describes your thoughts about having a COVID-19 booster vaccine…?’ and were asked to select one of six options that represented Stages 2 to 6.”
construct: PAPM stage of COVID-19 booster decision-making

justification: “we captured vaccine attitudes (2 items)… Items were based on items used in similar studies that have examined the psychological determinants of vaccine intention.”
“we captured… vaccine subjective norms (4 items)… All items (except ‘fear of needles’) were measured on a 5-point Likert scale.”
“we captured… vaccine perceived control (1 item)… measured on a 5-point Likert scale.”
“we captured… anticipated regret (3 items)… Items were based on items used in similar studies.”
“Regarding the HBM, we captured perceived severity (1 item)…”
“Regarding the HBM, we captured… perceived susceptibility (3 items)… measured on a 5-point Likert scale.”
“Regarding the HBM, we captured… perceived benefits (6 items)… all constructs had good internal consistency.”
“Regarding the HBM, we captured… perceived vaccine safety (2 items).”

measured_by: 3-item Knowledge of effectiveness, safety, and transmissibility scale
justification: “Other factors deemed relevant included knowledge about vaccine effectiveness, vaccine safety, and transmissibility of COVID-19 post-vaccination (3 items).”
“Questions focused on individuals’ overall experiences of receiving their first and second vaccine (5 items)… Items… had good internal consistency.”
construct: overall experience of previous COVID-19 vaccination

justification: “the quality of the healthcare environment (6 items)… adapted from the HEAL short form items [28].”
“patient-provider connection (4 items) when they received their second COVID-19 vaccine (adapted from the HEAL short form items [28]).”
“vaccine access (3 items)… all items were measured on a 5-point Likert scale.”

measured_by: 3-item Perceived Benefits of Prior Vaccination scale
justification: “and the perceived benefits from COVID-19 vaccination (3 items) (see Appendix A).”
construct: perceived benefits from prior COVID-19 vaccination
